sentences.sContent: They'd conspired to overthrow the government.
...a defendant accused of conspiring with his brother to commit robberies.
sentences.sCn: …被指控与其兄弟合谋抢劫的一名被告。

remMethod.val: con(共同) + spir(呼吸) + e → 共同呼吸 → 密谋

trans.tranCn: 密谋； 合力， 协作
trans.tranOther: If two or more people or groups conspire to do something illegal or harmful, they make a secret agreement to do it
